# Copilot Instructions

When creating blog pages:
- Follow the exact same structure as existing blog pages in this project
- Match the same component patterns, styling, and layout
- Use the project's existing CSS/styling system
- Add proper routing if a router exists
- Update any blog listing or index pages
- Use semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy
- Ensure responsive design
- Blog images are stored in src\assets\blogImages\
- Blog draft content files are in blog-drafts\
